titleStmt.title: Stella nova, a nevv starre, leading wisemen unto Christ. Or, A sermon preached before the learned Society of Astrologers, August 1. 1649. in the Church of S. Mary Alder-Mary, London. By Robert Gell D.D. minister of the Word there.
titleStmt.author: Gell, Robert, 1595-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Satterthwaite; and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Sun on Garlick-Hill,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon, preached before the Society of Astrologers.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Sun on Garlick-Hill
